biography: Glasgow Coma Scale is an ambient post rock band from Frankfurt on the river Main and was formed in February 2011 by Piotr and Marek Kowalski. The two brothers and trained classical musicians lived their lives between Krakow, Barcelona and Frankfurt. However, they never got the chance to play together in the same band. Along with drummer Helmes Bode the idea has now come full circle. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Glasgow Coma Scale

lastfm.bio_content: Glasgow Coma Scale is an ambient post rock band from Frankfurt on the river Main and was formed in February 2011 by Piotr and Marek Kowalski. The two brothers and trained classical musicians lived their lives between Krakow, Barcelona and Frankfurt. However, they never got the chance to play together in the same band. Along with drummer Helmes Bode the idea has now come full circle. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
